update.FilterExpression: SiteID = @Session_Siteid and (@ContextFields_emailRequired is null or EXISTS(select email from SiteContactEmail sce where sce.siteContactId = SiteContact.SiteContactId))
SiteID = @Session_Siteid and (@ContextFields_emailRequired is null or EXISTS(select email from SiteContactEmail sce where sce.siteContactId = SiteContactId))
SiteID = @Session_Siteid and (@ContextFields_emailRequired is null or FirstEmail is null)
SiteID = @Session_Siteid and (@ContextFields_emailRequired is null or FirstEmail is not null)
SiteID = @Session_Siteid and (@ContextFields_emailRequired is null or (select count(email) from SiteContactEmail where SiteContactEmail.siteContactId = SiteContact.siteContactId))
SiteID = @Session_Siteid and (@ContextFields_emailRequired is null or (select count(email) from SiteContactEmail where SiteContactEmail.siteContactId = SiteContact.siteContactId) > 0)
SiteID = @Session_Siteid and (@ContextFields_emailRequired is null or (select count(email) from SiteContactEmail where SiteContactEmail.siteContactId = SiteContactId) > 0)

(@Session_Siteid is null or SiteID = @Session_Siteid) and (@ContextFields_emailRequired is null or (select count(email) from SiteContactEmail where SiteContactEmail.siteContactId = SiteContactId) > 0)
(@Session_Siteid is null or SiteID = @Session_Siteid) and (@ContextFields_emailRequired is null)
(@Session_Siteid is null or SiteID = @Session_Siteid) and (@ContextFields_emailRequired is null or (select count(email) from SiteContactEmail where siteContactId = SiteContactId) > 0)
